system.description:
Prerequisites

Brawl

Benefit

When making an unarmed attack, the character receives a +2 bonus to their attack roll, and the character deals non-lethal bludgeoning damage equal to 2d6+POW modifer. Normal Unarmed attacks normally deal non-lethal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d3+POW modifier

Special

Characters with natural melee weapons can use this feat to increase their natural melee weaponâ€™s damage by two damage dice, but that damage becomes non-lethal.
